title: 1.12中林业mod泥炭引擎引擎崩溃
author: 郑叔叔
txt_content:
以及直接坏档，放下泥炭引擎后直接游戏崩溃，以下的日志文件，（推测泥炭引擎调用了bc的引擎，然后bc处于a版测试然后崩溃？？黑人？？？）
太多只列出了 errors，有log原文件在下面
[13:47:07] [Server thread/ERROR]: ExecutionException in getPlayer: com.google.common.util.concurrent.UncheckedExecutionException: java.lang.NullPointerException
[13:47:07] [Server thread/ERROR]: Error handling WorldEvent.Unload
[13:47:08] [Server thread/ERROR]: Encountered an unexpected exception
[13:47:09] [Server thread/ERROR]: This crash report has been saved to: F:\mc\自制mc\1.8\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2019-01-21_13.47.08-server.txt
[13:47:09] [Server thread/ERROR]: ExecutionException in getPlayer: com.google.common.util.concurrent.UncheckedExecutionException: java.lang.NullPointerException
[13:47:09] [Server thread/ERROR]: Error handling WorldEvent.Unload
[13:47:09] [Server thread/ERROR]: ExecutionException in getPlayer: com.google.common.util.concurrent.UncheckedExecutionException: java.lang.NullPointerException
[13:47:09] [Server thread/ERROR]: Error handling WorldEvent.Unload
[13:47:20] [Forestry Greenhouse/WARN]: GREENHOUSE TAKING 2432 ms LONGER THAN NORMAL
[13:47:20] [Client thread/FATAL]: Reported exception thrown!
AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed

replies.author: 郑叔叔
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 郑叔叔 于 2019-1-24 20:57 编辑 

经过实际测试删除bc后其泥炭引擎可以正常使用，姑且算为因为BC当前处于a版状态，估计引擎部分也没做好，在游戏内此版本bc引擎不是以RF为单位，然后林业用泥炭引擎调用bc引擎某些属性的时候出现了不可预知的错误，故删除bc即可，目前只能等待bc的稳定版本放出
